statements: UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_visited = 'Homepage', user_device = 'Desktop' WHERE user_id = 123 AND entry_id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET user_location = 'New York', timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE entry_id = 2 AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET user_location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET user_device = 'Mobile' WHERE entry_id = 1001;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_visited = 'homepage' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET behavior_event = 'clicked_button' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET behavior_event = 'Clicked on ad' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE website_visits SET duration_seconds = 300 WHERE visit_id = 1001;
UPDATE pages SET page_category = 'Educational' WHERE page_id = 500;
UPDATE website_visits SET duration_seconds = 120 WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE pages SET page_title = 'New Page Title', page_url = 'https://example.com/new-page' WHERE page_id = 5;
UPDATE web_traffic SET visit_duration = 30 WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_session SET session_end = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE session_id = 98765;
UPDATE web_traffic SET visit_duration = 30 WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'Purchase' WHERE visitor_id = 54321;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = page_views + 1 WHERE page_url = '/homepage';
UPDATE user_behavior SET interactions = interactions + 1, actions = actions + 1 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = page_views + 10, unique_visitors = unique_visitors + 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET actions = actions - 5, interactions = interactions + 3 WHERE user_id = 100;
